name: Fung Guys
description:
Fung Guys is an online-multiplayer, team-based, party game, heavily focused on exciting PvP minigames.
Enter an enchanted, stylized world in which you must win minigames to achieve the toad wizard’s approval.





  • Iconic Minigames - Play through exciting minigames: Capture the Flag, Spleef, King of the Hill, and Falling Platform.

  • PvP - Dash and bash your enemies and friends to victory.

  • Online Multiplayer - Host public/private lobbies, or join public servers.

  • Whimsical Setting - Play through beautiful enchanted forest levels.
